extendedInfo.description: Little Knight Mascot - Animated widget on home screen. People can drop the widget onto their home screen and interact with it by pressing the littleknight to go to  setting menu. The widget greatly notify you when some one's calling or texting. The mascot provide detailed world data... The widget provides the following:  * SMS reminder * Call reminder * Instant news (every 2mins) * Weather Info (twice a day) * Fortune telling (every 2mins) * What is Today (every 2mins) * Latest PowerUsage (every 2mins) * News (every 2mins) updatedDifferent size widgets4x4 Little Knight Mascot4x5 Little Knight MascotThere is also a setting menu so that you can turn on/off the displaying of information.choose widgets animation choose Little knight Mascot Widget.
